description.value: Hanakans have evolved a symbiotic relationship with a bacteria in their lungs, allowing them to survive in the toxic environments of their homeworld. An modification to your lungs based on this symbiosis grants you immunity to inhaled @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poisons}, and you are automatically acclimated to thin and thick atmospheres (CRB pg. 396).
